content: the chevy tee is lightweight simple and so fun to make using very basic stitches and a bit of sewing to create this stylish v-neck you will love how quick and easy it is to make pattern comes in children s sizes and adult sizes **what s included ** * 5 page printable pdf written in us terms * instructions for children s sizes 2-10 and women s sizes xs-3x * link to video stitch tutorial * photo tutorial for sewing pieces together **use coupon code crochetlove at checkout to get 30% off your pattern purchase of $10 or more cannot be combined with any other sale or code ** **pattern difficulty** easy **sizing ** bust circumference finished circumference approximate yardage 2 21 23 486 4 23 25 529 6 25 27 572 8 26 28 592 10 28 30 634 x-small 30 32 677 small 34 36 761 medium 38 40 846 large 42 44 931 x-large 46 48 1015 2x 50 52 1099 3x 54 56 1184 there is a 2 positive ease to this garment **yarn ** 4-10 skeins cotlin #3 dk 1 stitch tutorial https //youtu be/5znylh1hbpo all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **new to crocheting garments or need some extra help with them sign up for the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments email series ** 2 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1435478&u=1361772&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack= 2 https //www subscribepage com/crochetinggarmentsguide *listing contains affiliate links *
